    Start(Int32, AAnimation, out AnimationSpliter.Updater)

    Starts the animation that will play with splits. This function has to be called on FixedUpdate function.

    Declaration
    public void Start(int track, AAnimation animation, out AnimationSpliter.Updater updater)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Int32 track
    AAnimation animation
    AnimationSpliter.Updater updater
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    Update(AAnimation, ref AnimationSpliter.Updater, out Boolean)

    Updates the animation progress according to the splits. Call this function in each FixedUpdate until it returns false, after Start(Int32, AAnimation, out AnimationSpliter.Updater) function is called.

    Declaration
    public bool Update(AAnimation animation, ref AnimationSpliter.Updater updater, out bool indexChanged)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    AAnimation animation
    AnimationSpliter.Updater updater
    Boolean indexChanged
    Returns
    Type Description
